snippet: Mahinder Watsa, a gynecologist in Mumbai, tackles matters of sexual anxiety in his Ask the Sexpert column in a daily Indian newspaper, and tens of thousands of people have sought his help.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Dr Mahinder Watsa, 90-year-old sex columnist in Mumbai, India; Watsa, who has cultivated persona of crotchety, unshakable truth-teller, has pushed boundaries in culture at once obsessed with, confused by and squeamish about sex; only one-fifth of India's population receives any type of sex education.

byline.contributor: Malavika Vyawahare contributed reporting from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Mahinder Watsa, a gynecologist in Mumbai, tackles matters of sexual anxiety in his Ask the Sexpert column in a daily Indian newspaper, and tens of thousands of people have sought his help.

headline.main: 90-Year-Old Sex Columnist Shatters Taboos in India
headline.print_headline: 90-Year-Old Sex Columnist Shatters Taboos in India
